name: POS Next Receipt
html:
{%- set currency_symbol = frappe.db.get_value("Currency", doc.currency, "symbol") -%} {%- if not currency_symbol -%} {%- set currency_symbol = doc.currency -%} {%- endif -%}
{{ doc.company }}
TAX INVOICE
Invoice: {{ doc.name }}
Date: {{ doc.posting_date }} {{ (doc.posting_time|string).split('.')[0] if doc.posting_time else '' }}
{%- if doc.customer_name -%}
Customer: {{ doc.customer_name }}
{%- endif -%} {%- if doc.status == "Partly Paid" or (doc.outstanding_amount and doc.outstanding_amount > 0 and doc.outstanding_amount < doc.grand_total) -%}
Status: PARTIAL PAYMENT
{%- endif -%}
{%- for item in doc.items -%}
{{ item.item_name }}
{{ "%.0f"|format(item.qty) }} Ã— {{ currency_symbol }} {{ "%.2f"|format(item.price_list_rate or item.rate) }} {{ currency_symbol }} {{ "%.2f"|format(item.qty * (item.price_list_rate or item.rate)) }}
{%- if item.discount_percentage or item.discount_amount -%}
Discount{%- if item.discount_percentage -%} ({{ "%.1f"|format(item.discount_percentage) }}%){%- endif -%} -{{ currency_symbol }} {{ "%.2f"|format(item.discount_amount or 0) }}
{%- endif -%} {%- if item.serial_no -%}
Serial No:
{{ item.serial_no | replace("\n", ", ") }}
{%- endif -%}
{%- endfor -%}
{%- if doc.total_taxes_and_charges and doc.total_taxes_and_charges > 0 -%}
Subtotal: {{ currency_symbol }} {{ "%.2f"|format(doc.grand_total - doc.total_taxes_and_charges) }}
Tax: {{ currency_symbol }} {{ "%.2f"|format(doc.total_taxes_and_charges) }}
{%- endif -%} {%- if doc.discount_amount -%}
Additional Discount{%- if doc.additional_discount_percentage -%} ({{ "%.1f"|format(doc.additional_discount_percentage) }}%){%- endif -%}: -{{ currency_symbol }} {{ "%.2f"|format(doc.discount_amount|abs) }}
{%- endif -%}
TOTAL: {{ currency_symbol }} {{ "%.2f"|format(doc.grand_total) }}
{%- if doc.payments -%}
Payments:
{%- for payment in doc.payments -%}
{{ payment.mode_of_payment }}: {{ currency_symbol }} {{ "%.2f"|format(payment.amount) }}
{%- endfor -%}
Total Paid: {{ currency_symbol }} {{ "%.2f"|format(doc.paid_amount or 0) }}
{%- if doc.change_amount > 0 -%}
Change: {{ currency_symbol }} {{ "%.2f"|format(doc.change_amount) }}
{%- endif -%} {%- if doc.outstanding_amount and doc.outstanding_amount > 0 -%}
BALANCE DUE: {{ currency_symbol }} {{ "%.2f"|format(doc.outstanding_amount) }}
{%- endif -%} {%- endif -%}
